### Detection criteria

To identify potential duplicate profiles, the following variables must match:

 - Timestamp (`profile_timestamp`)
 - Rounded longitude (`round({{longitude_var_name}}, 3)`)
 - Rounded latitude (`round({{latitude_var_name}}, 3)`)

### Duplicate profiles

```{r, t_summary_dup_a1, echo = FALSE, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE}
df_dup_across <- find_duplicates_across_platforms({{df}})

create_dt_summary_tab(df_dup_across %>%
  dplyr::select(`Platforms` = platform_codes, `Profiles` = profile_nos,
                Timestamp = profile_timestamp,
                `Lon` = lon2, `Lat` = lat2, n))

```
